module Loggable:
    log(message, level:)
    self.included(base)

    module ClassMethods:
        enable_logging

module Serializable:
    to_json(*args*)
    from_json(json_string)
    serializable_hash
    load_from_hash(hash)

module RoleManager:
    VALID_ROLES
    self.each_role
    self.find_role(pattern)
    self.role_stats

class Document:
    initialize(title, content, author)
    process_content
    find_sections(pattern = ...)
    method_missing(method_name, *args*, &block)
    respond_to_missing?(method_name, include_private = ...)
    serializable_hash
    load_from_hash(hash)

class DocumentRepository:
    initialize
    add_document(document)
    filter_documents(&block)
    sort_documents(sort_proc = ...)
    log_action(message)
    validate_document(document)
